metadata.title: CVE-2024-42309 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/gma500: fix null pointer dereference in psb_intel_lvds_get_modesIn psb_intel_lvds_get_modes(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate() isassigned to mode, which will lead to a possible NULL pointer dereferenceon failure of drm_mode_duplicate(). Add a check to avoid npd.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
